title: Consider removing or improving _run_simple_annex_command
body:
This failure was first seen in gh-3667, but I pushed a branch with an empty commit on top of master, and that triggers the failure too:

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/build/job/twie1e8nxddgufn0#L1385

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.distribution.tests.test_update.test_multiway_merge
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 607, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\tests\test_update.py", line 399, in test_multiway_merge
    assert_status('ok', ds.publish(to='r1'))
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\dataset.py", line 526, in apply_func
    return f(**kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 499, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 487, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 435, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 536, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\publish.py", line 816, in __call__
    **res_kwargs):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\publish.py", line 360, in _publish_dataset
    **kwargs):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\publish.py", line 164, in _publish_data
    remote_wanted = ds.repo.get_preferred_content('wanted', remote)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 2437, in get_preferred_content
    annex_options=[remote or '.'])
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 935, in _run_simple_annex_command
    assert(len(lines_) <= 1)
AssertionError
```

The [last passing build][0] had git-annex 7.20190731-gc131c0f0c, and this failing one is at 7.20190912-g05bc37910.

[0]: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/builds/27389604/job/mdymsm41isx4mt3d?fullLog=true#L523
